mapper.insert: insert into COMPANY_INFO(COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_TEL, C_ADDR_DO, C_ADDR_SI, C_ADDR_DONG, C_ADDR_DETAIL, MEMBER_ID) values(#{company_code}, #{company_name}, #{company_tel}, '부산광역시', '자갈치', '시장', '336-33', #{member_id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from(select obj.*, b.win_bid_whether, b.company_code from(select t.tender_code, p.refund_whether,p.payment_date from tender t, payment p where t.tender_code = p.tender_code and p.refund_whether = 'n') obj, bid b where obj.tender_code = b.tender_code and b.win_bid_whether = 'y') o where o.company_code = #{company_code} and o.payment_date between to_date(#{period_day},'yyyy-MM-dd') and sysdate

select to_char(avg(star_score),'99.9') star_score_avg from(select obj.*, b.win_bid_whether, b.company_code from(select t.tender_code, p.refund_whether,p.star_score from tender t, payment p where t.tender_code = p.tender_code and p.refund_whether = 'n') obj, bid b where obj.tender_code = b.tender_code and b.win_bid_whether = 'y') o where o.company_code = #{company_code}
select company_code from company_info where member_id=#{member_id}
select company_name from company_info where company_code=#{company_code}
select member_id from company_info where company_code=#{company_code}

select c.company_code,m.member_id, to_char(d.demand_date,'yy-mm') as month, sum(P.payment_price) as sum from DEMAND D, PAYMENT P, MEMBER M, company_info C,PRODUCT PR where D.DEMAND_CODE = P.DEMAND_CODE and M.MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID and PR.PRODUCT_CODE = D.PRODUCT_CODE and PR.COMPANY_CODE = C.COMPANY_CODE and c.company_code= (select company_code from company_info where member_id = #{member_id}) group by c.company_code,m.member_id, to_char(d.demand_date,'yy-mm') order by to_char(d.demand_date,'yy-mm')
